name: Canadian Copper Mining Data - D Young Thesis
description: Mine-level copper data (1953-1984) used in Young, D. (1992), "Cost Specification and Firm Behaviour in a Hotelling Model of Resource Extraction," Canadian Journal of Economics XXV, 41-59. Spreadsheet has 5 tabs (including data and explanatory materials).

citation.text: Young, D. (1992), "Cost Specification and Firm Behaviour in a Hotelling Model of Resource Extraction," Canadian Journal of Economics XXV, 41-59

distribution.name: CopperMiningYoung.xlsx
distribution.description: Excel spreadsheet with data and notes
